text:
="preserve">Augusto Caminito (1 July 1939 – 23 August 2020) was an Italian movie director, screenwriter, and producer. He was born in Naples. As a director, he was known for his works "Grandi cacciatori" (1988) and "Vampire in Venice" (1988). He produced "Ne parliamo Lunedì" (1990). He also wrote the screenplay for "Halleluja for Django" (1967).
Caminito died on 23 August 2020 in Rome, aged 81.
